meanings.definition: Treated with excessive care or attention
meanings.sent1: The pampered cat enjoyed sleeping on a soft cushion.
meanings.sent2: She felt pampered when she received a relaxing massage at the spa.
meanings.sent3: The pampered puppy refused to eat anything but gourmet dog food.
meanings.sent4: The pampered celebrity demanded only the finest champagne at the party.
meanings.sent5: The pampered princess had a golden crown and silk robes.

meanings.sent1: The pampered hotel guests were greeted with warm towels and chocolates.
meanings.sent2: He lived a pampered life in a mansion with a personal chef.
meanings.sent3: The pampered child insisted on having a pony for a pet.
meanings.sent4: The pampered traveler only stayed in 5-star hotels.
meanings.sent5: The pampered millionaire owned a yacht and a private jet.

meanings.sent1: She pampered her plants by watering them twice a day.
meanings.sent2: The grandparents pampered their grandchildren with gifts and treats.
meanings.sent3: He pampered his car by washing it every weekend.
meanings.sent4: The chef pampered the guests with a 7-course meal.
meanings.sent5: The spa pampered its clients with luxurious facials and massages.
